Product title: Compact Toilet Brush & Holder, Stainless Steel Handle, Space Saving for Storage, Deep Cleaning, Drip-Proof, Easy to Assemble, Nylon Bristles, White & Grey
Key Features: Compact Size：The holder measures 4.1" x 3.3" x 5.1", Small Size holder Space Saving for Storage and Organization, Easy to hide to ensure the beauty of the bathroom. | Hidden Toilet Scrubber: Toilet brush with plastic cover hides the brush head inside the base from view, keeping it beautiful. | Durable Bristles: toilet bowl brush and holder with Sturdy-bristled deep clean the toilet, such as under the rim, inside the pipe. The brush sits in its own holder and easy to store. | Stainless steel and plastic handle: forbidden to soak in toilet cleaner to avoid corrosion and rust. After use, rinse with clean water and dry in time for maintenance. | High Quality Base: High-quality ABS thickened toilet cleaner brush base，The compact size doesn't take up too much space, and the elegant design matches every bathroom style.
comment 1: Nice product. Very easy to assemble and is in little box , compact , and very needed to clean. Cleans good and very sturdy, wont break, like some others of similar type toilet brush. - Kathy Klein
comment 2: Great product! Does the job and easy to assemble.  Totally cute appearance. - Stewie
comment 3: Pretty good, cleans well, and easy assembly. I'd prefer a one piece but for the price and how quick it came, very happy - Dave
comment 4: This toilet brush was extremely easy to put together and is definitely space-saving! It easily fits behind my toilet and looks sleek! It's made of a lightweight plastic but doesn't feel like it will break as soon as it's used. The bristles are stiff and they scrub the toilet bowl efficiently. I definitely recommend this product and love how affordable it was! - Rebecca
comment 5: Brush is a little small but It is fine, does the jobIs easy to useAudrey Frieman - Poli
